home_whyus_title: There are many reasons to trust Just Life!
home_whyus_p1: Being a unique app means that it includes a very wide range of home services, so we meet all your needs!
home_whyus_p2: Our experts are equipped with the best equipment and tools, and services are always priced with our service users in mind.
home_whyus_p3: Book your session in less than 60 seconds, and you can also schedule an appointment on the same day.
home_whyus_p4: Our experts are trusted and professionally trained, with a rating of 4.78 out of 5!
home_sponsor_title: Just Life works to protect you and your home
home_sponsor_p: Giving you peace of mind is our top priority. Therefore, in the event of any unexpected damage occurring during the provision of the service; We will compensate you up to 1000 AED*.
home_say_title: What users say about Just Live
home_say_p: Just Live rated 4.8 out of 5 based on 962 reviews since August 2022.
home_say_p2: Amazing, comfortable and professional service, I wish it would never end! The staff is experienced High and they give one of the best massages I've ever had!

Policy_p1: Our privacy policy describes how we collect and process your personal information, such as the information you provide through our application. The policy also outlines your rights regarding your personal information, how it is retained, and secured.
Policy_p2: Communication: Various communication channels are provided in case of any questions or inquiries about the privacy policy. You can speak to the team through the application, call the specified number, or contact them via email.
Policy_p3: Updates: In the event of any changes in the way personal information is processed or in the policy itself, you will be promptly notified via email and the application will be updated. This is a general summary, and if you need assistance or additional clarification on a specific part of the text, feel free to ask
